instance.name: Plugins
instance.default: autoresize textpattern lists advlist a11ychecker linkchecker media mediaembed powerpaste tinymcespellchecker advcode image
instance.description: Space separated list of TinyMCE plugins to enable. See https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/plugins/ for more information on plugins.

instance.name: Word Import Type
instance.description: This setting controls how content being pasted from Microsoft Word is filtered. Possible values: clean, merge, prompt

instance.name: HTML Import Type
instance.description: This setting controls how content being pasted from sources other than Microsoft Word is filtered. Note that this includes content copied from TinyMCE itself. Possible values: clean, merge, prompt

instance.name: Toolbar
instance.default: undo redo | formatselect | bold italic | alignleft aligncenter alignright alignjustify | numlist bullist outdent intent | code
instance.description: Specify your toolbar configuration here. To use the default toolbar, clear this field. To hide the toolbar, enter the value 'false'. See https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/configure/editor-appearance/#

instance.name: Menubar
instance.description: Specify the menus to display here. To use the default menu bar, clear this field. To hide the menu, enter the value 'false'. See https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/configure/editor-appearance/#menubar
